title: In-Depth Analysis
description: We stick to a profound Discovery process and thoroughly study the environment around your future product â€“ competitors, audience, market, trends, potential investors and your own business ecosystem.

title: UX discovery phase
description: During the UX discovery phase, you can expect a kick-off meeting with the UX team, whiteboarding, first Figma visualization, and lo-fi frames. The final stage of this phase will be the design of the product's visual side.

title: Pilot MVP Development
description: With Pilot MVP development, we can help to convert your MVP from a single feature product to a new fangled product that provides greater usability, scalability, and market expediency.

title: MVP Development
description: We help you with defining the solution that an MVP should deliver. You can rely on us for functional analysis of the product, domain requirements, and minimum functionalities prioritization. Moreover, we provide you with tailor-made high-level design, including technology stack, architecture proposition, and time and budget estimates.

title: MVP Mobile Application
description: We aim to create functional MVP mobile apps for businesses to insert value into their business, build an online image and expand reach.

title: MVP Consulting
description: Our team discovers your product idea and performs market and user analysis. Based on this data, we describe the product implementation roadmap including MVP functionality and backlog. We also propose the most appropriate tech stack and architecture approach.
